body_html: How does arbitrary 0 dimensions solve the zero-filled sparse tensor issue? e.g. if I use one of the size-constructors to create a size (4, 5, 6) sparse tensor, what should indices.size(), values.size(), nDimI, and nDimV be?
body_text: How does arbitrary 0 dimensions solve the zero-filled sparse tensor issue?  e.g. if I use one of the size-constructors to create a size (4, 5, 6) sparse tensor, what should indices.size(), values.size(), nDimI, and nDimV be?
body: How does arbitrary 0 dimensions solve the zero-filled sparse tensor issue?  e.g. if I use one of the size-constructors to create a size (4, 5, 6) sparse tensor, what should `indices.size()`, `values.size()`, `nDimI`, and `nDimV` be?
